channel.title: Happiness with Wealth
channel.description: Happiness with wealth is possible for all. There is a step by step process to achieve both happiness and wealth. this podcast will take you though the steps to achieving both.
channel.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
channel.itunes:summary: Happiness with wealth is possible for all. There is a step by step process to achieve both happiness and wealth. this podcast will take you though the steps to achieving both.

item.title: Sometimes the unexpected happen
item.description: Did you ever go to a meeting thinking good thinks could come from the meeting, but in most cases they don’t?
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Did you ever go to a meeting thinking good thinks could come from the meeting, but in most cases they don’t?

item.title: It is time to make it happen
item.description: How many times have you told yourself “I’ll start next week” and then next week comes and goes and you still haven’t started. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: How many times have you told yourself “I’ll start next week” and then next week comes and goes and you still haven’t started. Listen and learn

item.title: Creating Affluence by Deepak Chopra
item.description: The important thing is to go for happpines first. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: The important thing is to go for happpines first. Listen and learn

item.title: Today is what is suppose to be
item.description: You want your life to be less stressful, accept things as they are. Don’t wish there were different, because you can’t change what has happened. What has happened is what was supposed to happen. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: You want your life to be less stressful, accept things as they are. Don’t wish there were different, because you can’t change what has happened. What has happened is what was supposed to happen. Listen and learn

item.title: What are you doing right now?
item.description: Ok your reading my blog or listening to my podcast. But what were you doing just before and what do you plan to do right after. It is my hope that after you read my blog or listen to my podcast, I got you to think. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Ok your reading my blog or listening to my podcast. But what were you doing just before and what do you plan to do right after. It is my hope that after you read my blog or listen to my podcast, I got you to think. Listen and learn

item.title: Be healthy be happy
item.description: Have you noticed happy people are generally healthy? Even if their sick they always are in good spirits. One thing they do is laugh, laugh and laugh some more. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Have you noticed happy people are generally healthy? Even if their sick they always are in good spirits. One thing they do is laugh, laugh and laugh some more. Listen and learn

item.title: Improve everyday
item.description: If we improve our self a little every day in a year we can make some fantastic improvements. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: If we improve our self a little every day in a year we can make some fantastic improvements. Listen and learn

item.title: In with the new
item.description: Out with the old; get those things that didn’t like out of your mind. Let’s look at realistically, what has happened, no matter how much you want to change them you can. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Out with the old; get those things that didn’t like out of your mind. Let’s look at realistically, what has happened, no matter how much you want to change them you can. Listen and learn

item.title: It is time to review and regroup
item.description: Take time to review last year, all the things you accomplished and those that you didn’t. Ask yourself what did do to accomplish the things and ,what were the stumbling blocks for not accomplishing the things you wanted to. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Take time to review last year, all the things you accomplished and those that you didn’t. Ask yourself what did do to accomplish the things and ,what were the stumbling blocks for not accomplishing the things you wanted to. Listen and learn

item.title: Baby it is cold outside
item.description: You bet its cold. When I walked this morning I wore long pants, a EMU ( Eastern Michigan University) heavy sweat shirt, and my lined Miami Hurricanes winter jacket. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: You bet its cold. When I walked this morning I wore long pants, a EMU ( Eastern Michigan University) heavy sweat shirt, and my lined Miami Hurricanes winter jacket. Listen and learn

item.title: The little things build into big things
item.description: Alan Mulally the president and CEO of Ford didn’t try to do everything at once, but started with the little things. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Alan Mulally the president and CEO of Ford didn’t try to do everything at once, but started with the little things. Listen and learn

item.title: Do the little things right and…
item.description: Do the little things right and so many things go right, like the big things. Here is story for a guy who made the little thing right and made something happiness that many didn’t think that could happen. Lisen and learn

item.title: Appreciation
item.description: So many times we don’t appreciation something tell we lose it. For example last week I got a terrible throat infection and I can say it stopped me in my tracks. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: So many times we don’t appreciation something tell we lose it. For example last week I got a terrible throat infection and I can say it stopped me in my tracks. Listen and learn

item.title: Why not laugh
item.description: Laughing is a good work out for your diaphragm, abdominal, respiratory, facial, leg and back muscles. Not only does laughter give your midsection a workout, it can benefit digestion and absorption functioning as well. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Laughing is a good work out for your diaphragm, abdominal, respiratory, facial, leg and back muscles. Not only does laughter give your midsection a workout, it can benefit digestion and absorption functioning as well. Listen and learn

item.title: We are never too old to learn
item.description: Studies now show that we can keep on learning no matter what your age. So who cares? We should all care? By continually learning the world becomes a wonderful place. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Studies now show that we can keep on learning no matter what your age. So who cares? We should all care? By continually learning the world becomes a wonderful place. Listen and learn

item.title: Listening is an important skill
item.description: We have all been around people that never stop talking. They might have interesting things to tell you and that’s fine, but what have learned about us, nothing. Listen and Learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: We have all been around people that never stop talking. They might have interesting things to tell you and that’s fine, but what have learned about us, nothing. Listen and Learn

item.title: Celebrate
item.description: Happy birthday, thanksgiving and happy new years, these are all time for celebrations. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Happy birthday, thanksgiving and happy new years, these are all time for celebrations. Listen and learn

item.title: IT IS TIME TO THINK BIG
item.description: When you think big things happen, so why think small? When you think small you miss so many opportunities, so don’t do that and think big and take the many opportunities that are available to you. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: When you think big things happen, so why think small? When you think small you miss so many opportunities, so don’t do that and think big and take the many opportunities that are available to you. Listen and learn

item.title: Yes it s time to be THANKFUL
item.description: It is so easy at times to see all the bad things in the world. The question is can we control them? I think not, but let’s look at all the good things that are going around us daily. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: It is so easy at times to see all the bad things in the world. The question is can we control them? I think not, but let’s look at all the good things that are going around us daily. Listen and learn

item.title: Laugh at yourself
item.description: Laughing is healthy, so why not laugh at yourself? When we take our selves to seriously that is not good. When we laugh at our self we share an embarrassing moment with others. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: Laughing is healthy, so why not laugh at yourself? When we take our selves to seriously that is not good. When we laugh at our self we share an embarrassing moment with others. Listen and learn

item.title: Being a care giver
item.description: A week ago Friday Micki had knee surgery. It was out patient, so she was home by 3:00 PM. They had her full of pain medication, thus she felt pretty good. Listen and learn

item.itunes:summary: A week ago Friday Micki had knee surgery. It was out patient, so she was home by 3:00 PM. They had her full of pain medication, thus she felt pretty good. Listen and learn

item.title: It is over
item.description: At least I hope so. For almost two years we have been inundate with so much political information my head is not only spinning and I am sure I don’t want to hear anything related to politics. Listen and learn

item.title: Make more out of life; see the glass as half full.
item.description: It all depends who you talk to. There are those that tell you the world is going bad and others are seeing opportunities that going to make them rich. Why such a different? Listen and learn

item.title: Funny questions I get about A Child Is Missing
item.description: A Child Is Missing when called for an alert makes 1000 calls per minute. Here are some of the questions that commonly come up. This one floors me, how many people does it take to make 1000 alert call and the answer is 1. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: A Child Is Missing when called for an alert makes 1000 calls per minute. Here are some of the questions that commonly come up. This one floors me, how many people does it take to make 1000 alert call and the answer is 1. Listen and learn

item.title: A Child is Missing saves lives and money
item.description: A Child is Missing has had 775 save recoveries and that is wonderful. What is even more impacting is A Child Is Missing had 8,432 alert calls in the last 24 months. Listen and learn
item.itunes:author: David H. Lindemann
item.itunes:summary: A Child is Missing has had 775 save recoveries and that is wonderful. What is even more impacting is A Child Is Missing had 8,432 alert calls in the last 24 months. Listen and learn

item.title: Building your success

item.title: Do you know where your’ going?
item.description: In, Alice in Wonderland, there is this vintage quote. “If you don’t know where you are going any road will take you there” said Cheshire Cat. So one way to know where you are going is to have a personal mission statement. Listen and learn

item.title: Health is more important than wealth?
item.description: Out of 1036 people polled 939 voted yes. That is 91% and that a high percentage. Now let’s look at why people value health so much more than wealth. This so obvious, but I have to say it. Listen and learn

item.title: Getting ahead
item.description: To get ahead, you need others help. They can be your teachers, your friends or someone who sees some hidden strength in you and one thing you do not want to do to these people is be disagreeable to them. Listen and learn
